dmca.title: CNN not laughing at CNN / CollegeHumor mashup
dmca.body:
This is to notify you that the web page at http://a.parsons.edu/~haraldur/chnn/ and hosted by Parsons School of Design ("the Unauthorized Page") infringes upon the copyrights and trademark rights held by CNN in its site located at CNN.com.  This use is not authorized by the copyright or intellectual property right owner, CNN, its agents, or the law.  We request that the page be immediately disabled and contact information for the site operator be forwarded to my attention at:

Cable News Network LP, LLLP 
[private]
Atlanta, Georgia  30303 
telephone:  [private]
facsimile:  [private] 
e-mail:  [private]@turner.com 

Under penalty of perjury, I hereby declare that this Notice is accurate and that I am authorized to act on behalf of CNN. 

Thank you, 

[private] 
Counsel 
Cable News Network LP, LLLP
dmca.principal_name: CNN / Cable News Network LP, LLLP
